name: Income Tax
details: Tax on all yearly profits arising from property, profession, trades, or offices, or as a tax on a person's income, emoluments, profits and the like. It is a tax upon the privilege of receiving income or profit. It is an excise tax, and not a tax on property.

children.name: Citizen
children.details: CONST, Art. IV, Sec. 4

children.name: Resident Citizen
children.details: A citizen of the Philippines who stayed in the Philippines or stayed outside the Philippines for less than 183 days during the taxable year.

children.name: Non-Resident Citizen
children.details: WELP 1) Works abroad most of the time 2) Establishes fact of physical presence abroad with a definite intention to reside therein 3) Leaves to reside abroad as an immigrant or for employment on a permanent basis 4) Previously considered as non-resident citizen for his income derived abroad

children.name: Resident Alien
children.details: An individual whose residence is within the Philippines and who is not a citizen thereof. (Rep. Act No. 8424, Tax Reform Act of 1997, sec. 22(F))

children.name: Alien
children.details: Any person not a citizen of the Philippines. (Com. Act No. 613, The Philippine Immigration Act of 1940, sec. 50 (b))

children.name: Resident Alien

children.name: Non-Resident Alien
